name: Windows Manage Local User Account Deletion
author: chao-mu
description:
This module deletes a local user account from the specified server,
        or the local machine if no server is given.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: USERNAME
options.description: The username of the user to delete (not-qualified, e.g. BOB)

options.name: SERVER_NAME
options.description: DNS or NetBIOS name of remote server on which to delete user
